languages.text: "Этот суд нелегитимен, поскольку является частью махинации префекта Вультур. Искажение правосудия Императора недопустимо". {n}Соломон обводит взглядом арбитров и задерживается на маршале.{/n} "Мне приходится объяснять очевидное, и это только подчеркивает слепоту, что поразила слуг закона Его".

"This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."
languages.original_text: "Этот суд нелегитимен, поскольку является частью махинации префекта Вультур. Искажение правосудия Императора недопустимо". {n}Соломон обводит взглядом арбитров и задерживается на маршале.{/n} "Мне приходится объяснять очевидное, и это только подчеркивает слепоту, что поразила слуг закона Его".

Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His law."

"This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

"This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

languages.text: "Dieses Gericht hat keine Autorität, da es Teil von Präfektin Vulturs Machenschaften ist. Die Zersetzung der Justiz des Imperators wird nicht toleriert." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Blick über die Arbitratoren schweifen und schließlich auf dem Marschall ruhen.{/n} "Ich bin gezwungen, das Offensichtliche zu erklären, und es unterstreicht nur die Blindheit, die die Diener Seines Gesetzes befallen hat."
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Gericht hat keine Autorität, da es Teil von Präfektin Vulturs Machenschaften ist. Die Zersetzung der Justiz des Imperators wird nicht toleriert." {n}Solomorne lässt seinen Blick über die Arbitratoren schweifen und schließlich auf dem Marschall ruhen.{/n} "Ich bin gezwungen, das Offensichtliche zu erklären, und es unterstreicht nur die Blindheit, die die Diener Seines Gesetzes befallen hat."

languages.text: « Cette cour n'a aucune légitimité, puisqu'elle est le fruit des manœuvres de la préfète Vultur. La subversion de la justice de l'Empereur ne saurait être tolérée. {n}Le regard de Solomorne balaie les arbitrators avant de se poser sur le maréchal.{/n} Je me vois forcé d'énoncer une évidence qui ne fait que souligner l'aveuglement dont souffrent les serviteurs de Sa loi. »
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: « Cette cour n'a aucune légitimité, puisqu'elle est le fruit des manœuvres de la préfète Vultur. La subversion de la justice de l'Empereur ne saurait être tolérée. {n}Le regard de Solomorne balaie les arbitrators avant de se poser sur le maréchal.{/n} Je me vois forcé d'énoncer une évidence qui ne fait que souligner l'aveuglement dont souffrent les serviteurs de Sa loi. »

« Cette cour n'a aucune légitimité, puisqu'elle est le fruit des manœuvres de la préfète Vultur. La subversion de la justice de l'Empereur ne saurait être tolérée. {n}Le regard de Solomorne balaie les arbitrators avant de se poser sur le maréchal.{/n} Je me vois forcé d'énoncer une évidence qui ne fait que souligner l'aveuglement dont souffrent les serviteurs de Sa loi. »

languages.text: “这个法庭没有任何权威可言，因为它本身就是沃尔图尔行政官阴谋的一部分。我无法容忍对帝皇正义的颠覆行为。”{n}索罗蒙目光扫过所有法务官，最终停在了元帅身上。{/n}“我不得不解释显而易见的事情，而这只会进一步证明，帝皇律法的仆人已经变得多么盲目。”
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: “这个法庭没有任何权威可言，因为它本身就是沃尔图尔行政官阴谋的一部分。我无法容忍对帝皇正义的颠覆行为。”{n}索罗蒙目光扫过所有法务官，最终停在了元帅身上。{/n}“我不得不解释显而易见的事情，而这只会进一步证明，帝皇律法的仆人已经变得多么盲目。”

languages.text: «Este tribunal no tiene ninguna autoridad, pues forma parte de las intrigas de la prefecta Vultur. No se tolerará la subversión de la justicia del Emperador». {n}La mirada de Solomorne recorre a los Arbitrator y se detiene sobre el Mariscal.{/n} «Me veo forzado a explicar lo evidente, y eso solo subraya la ceguera que han sufrido los sirvientes de Su ley».
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: «Este tribunal no tiene ninguna autoridad, pues forma parte de las intrigas de la prefecta Vultur. No se tolerará la subversión de la justicia del Emperador». {n}La mirada de Solomorne recorre a los Arbitrator y se detiene sobre el Mariscal.{/n} «Me veo forzado a explicar lo evidente, y eso solo subraya la ceguera que han sufrido los sirvientes de Su ley».

languages.text: 「この法廷には何の権限もありません。なぜなら、ヴァルター総監の策謀の一部に過ぎないからです。皇帝陛下の正義の歪曲は、決して許されません」{n}ソロモーンはアービトレイターたちを見渡し、その視線を将帥の上で止めた。{/n}「私はあえて明白なことを説明しなければなりません。それは、陛下の法を奉じる者たちがいかに盲目になっているかを浮き彫りにするでしょう」
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: 「この法廷には何の権限もありません。なぜなら、ヴァルター総監の策謀の一部に過ぎないからです。皇帝陛下の正義の歪曲は、決して許されません」{n}ソロモーンはアービトレイターたちを見渡し、その視線を将帥の上で止めた。{/n}「私はあえて明白なことを説明しなければなりません。それは、陛下の法を奉じる者たちがいかに盲目になっているかを浮き彫りにするでしょう」

languages.text: "Prefekt Vultur'un kumpasına alet olmuş bu mahkemenin hükmünü tanımıyorum. İmparator'un adaletinin bu denli kötüye kullanımı kabul edilemez." {n}Solomorne, Yargıcıları süzdükten sonra Miralay'a bakıyor.{/n} "Malumu ilam etmek durumundayım ki bu, O'nun Kanunu'na uyan siz kulların ne denli kör olduğunu daha açık şekilde ortaya koyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "This court has no authority, as it is part of Prefect Vultur's machinations. Subversion of the Emperor's justice will not be tolerated." {n}Solomorne's gaze sweeps over the Arbitrators and pauses on the Marshal.{/n} "I am forced to explain the obvious, and it only underscores the blindness that has afflicted the servants of His Law."

traits.locale_text: "Prefekt Vultur'un kumpasına alet olmuş bu mahkemenin hükmünü tanımıyorum. İmparator'un adaletinin bu denli kötüye kullanımı kabul edilemez." {n}Solomorne, Yargıcılara bir göz gezdirdikten sonra Miralay'a bakıyor.{/n} "Malumu ilam etmek durumundayım ki bu, İmparator'un Yasası'na uyan siz kulların ne denli kör olduğunu daha açık şekilde ortaya koyacaktır."

"Prefekt Vultur'un kumpasına alet olmuş bu mahkemenin hükmünü tanımıyorum. İmparator'un adaletinin bu denli kötüye kullanımı kabul edilemez." {n}Solomorne, Yargıcılara bir göz gezdirdikten sonra Miralay'a bakıyor.{/n} "Malumu ilam etmek durumundayım ki bu, siz İmparator kullarının ne denli kör olduğunu daha açık şekilde ortaya koyacaktır."
